item.title: Use Miniconda
item.description: # Miniconda A lightweight version of Anaconda. While Anaconda includes many libraries and IDEs, Miniconda focuses on conda, Python, and the minimum required libraries. What is good Lightweight compared to Anaconda At the time of installation, since various Anaconda is included, it will be about several GB. In that respect Miniconda contains only the minimum required, so it will be several hundred MB. conda can be used conda is a tool for managing Python packages and versioning Python itself.
